department: College of Computing and Digital Media
biography: Tom Long first taught for CTI in the spring 2000 quarter when he was assigned SE 465.  Tom also teaches for Depaul's School for New Learning.  He earned an MS in computer science and a BS in English and linguistics from Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and an MA in English and linguistics from Rutgers University.  He has over 30 years of experience of software development, consulting and education.
